long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the givingabit ‘forgetmenot’ widget, you can browse and shop online, and never forget to create a donation for your chosen good cause.

The ‘forgetmenot’ lets you know when you could create a donation – without having to remember to visit the shops from givingabit.com

If you are on google, any results that could create a donation for you will be highlighted, or, if you go directly to an online shop that is a partner of givingabit, a drop down message will appear at the top of the screen, letting you know a donation can be created.

This is a handy tool, which helps you remember to create those all important donations for your chosen good cause, even if you forget!

Download the ‘forgetmenot’ today and your browser will automatically be updated.

For all our terms and conditions including our use of cookies, please visit www.givingabit.com/content/14/
